---
title: "Botzool Data Analysis"
---

This is a website for the study materials related to the courses on data analysis at the Department of Botany and Zoology, Faculty of Science, Masaryk University.

The related courses are:

-   [Bi8190 Manipulace a vizualizace dat v R (Data manipulation and visualisation in R)](https://is.muni.cz/predmet/sci/podzim2025/BI8190)
-   [Bi6050 Introduction to Biostatistics in English](https://is.muni.cz/predmet/sci/jaro2026/BI6050)
-   [Bi7540 Analýza dat v ekologii společenstev](https://is.muni.cz/predmet/sci/podzim2025/BI7540)
-   [Bi7542 Data analysis in community ecology](https://is.muni.cz/predmet/sci/podzim2025/BI7542)

Moreover, this website contains guidelines for the use of AI in ecology.
